title: @Reav3! Can the roadmap come at 9am PST please!
body:
I can't wait no longer and by 9am PST which is 12am Tuesday here where I live. Please bear with me.

I really wanna see the VGU's after Nunu. And its supposed to come early this week so its monday-tuesday. (lets say, mid this week is wed-fri and late this week is sat-sun).

replies.body: not 9, but close
i'm sure you already made up your mind about this but you just want to make us wait lol

Lol, I don't get to decide when it goes out. I just write it and then our publishing team decides when it comes out. I do know when it comes out though, and lets just say I would start refreshing LoL nexus if I were you :P
now if you look at "disappointed" in the dictionary you'll see my face XD
Don't worry, he will get his turn
I knew it wasn't likely since you've done a lot of dark juggernaut reworks (Yorick and urgot AND aatrox) but I need my death knight fix
well, it's not like i got any choice  aha. see you in this moment then XD
Damn ! hope it's mordekaiser otherwise i'll be super sad!
yup hahaha he loves to make us look like fools by waiting lol that's why he is one of my fave rioters.
Or it just takes a while to write, edit, and publish these things.

So, is it coming out this week? I’ve missed some infos apparently :(

Edit: nvm I’m fucking blind

> [{quoted}](name=Reav3,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=2lys3Eq1,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-08-06T16:23:26.564+0000)
>
> not 9, but close

hi reave3 i dont know if you are the correct guy but could you please ask to bring back the old rengar sounds, partilces and animations that got lost during the s7 rework? TY
https://tenor.com/view/sister-act-happy-day-gif-5784347
OMG hahaha don't tell me its 11am PST all over again. The usual time as usual. Nevertheless, I'll stay awake until i'll see the roadmap today lol until 4 am which is 1:00 PST/ in your time.
{{champion:90}} stays in the void...
I'm expecting it on Wednesday, but I want to know juicy infos already, maybe it'd even be the right time to ask for new tier one?

Yes! hear us reav3! we want juicy infos already!!!

This is the old tier one:
> [{quoted}](name=Reav3,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Q30wxkKg,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-01-31T21:25:48.580+0000)
>
> I would say the current pool after Akali/Irelia are
> 
> {{champion:36}} {{champion:42}} {{champion:31}} {{champion:9}} {{champion:10}} {{champion:85}} {{champion:96}} {{champion:56}} {{champion:82}} {{champion:20}} {{champion:80}} {{champion:33}} {{champion:72}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:77}} {{champion:106}} 
> 
> These are the ones we generally discuss talk about these days when we go into early ideation on new VGUs. Some more then others, but all of these would make sense at this point, for various reasons. Obviously Kayle would be paired with a Morgana, should we end up working on her.

So, my prediction promotion for the new tier one (removing nunu and maybe kayle) are:

{{champion:36}} {{champion:42}} {{champion:31}} {{champion:9}} {{champion:85}} {{champion:96}} {{champion:56}} {{champion:82}} {{champion:80}} {{champion:33}} {{champion:72}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:77}} {{champion:106}} {{champion:32}} {{champion:54}} 

Adding amumu and malphite into the mix :)

honorable mentions: {{champion:17}}  and {{champion:23}}
{{champion:133}} was pretty close to it, so promote her too.
It's already 2pm where i live. Waiting is annoying!
yes its annoying. I'm waiting for it since akali's teaser was released. its 9:49pm, monday now where i live.
